sentences.en: ‘Don’t just stand there, give me a hand,’ she barked at the shop assistant.
sentences.cn: “别光站在那里，帮我一把。”她对那店员吼道。

sentences.en: "Ha!" It was a cross between a laugh and a bark.
sentences.cn: “哈！”那声音听起来既像在笑又像在叫。

sentences.en: a bark of laughter
sentences.cn: 一声大笑

sentences.en: Amy’s voice was a hoarse bark.
sentences.cn: 艾美发出的是粗哑的吼声。

sentences.en: Bark may be used as raw material for paper - making.
sentences.cn: 树皮可以做造纸的原料.

sentences.en: Cocks crow and dogs bark.
sentences.cn: 鸡叫狗咬.

sentences.en: Cork bark is closely intertwined with the lives of the people in these regions.
sentences.cn: 软木橡树的树皮与这些地方的百姓生活密切地交织在一起。

sentences.en: Don't let the dogs bark.
sentences.cn: 让那些狗别叫。

sentences.en: He bared the tree of its bark.
sentences.cn: 他剥光树皮.

sentences.en: He slashed the bark off the tree with his knife.
sentences.cn: 他用刀把树皮从树上砍下.

sentences.en: He started to hack away at the tree bark.
sentences.cn: 他开始砍树皮。

sentences.en: I barked my shin against the step.
sentences.cn: 我在台阶上蹭破了胫部。

sentences.en: I set the log on the ground and shaved off the bark.
sentences.cn: 我将原木放到了地上，刨掉了树皮。

sentences.en: In Finland purists insist that only birch bark should be added.
sentences.cn: 在芬兰，纯化论者坚持说只能加白桦树皮。

sentences.en: In his workshop, a Kakunodate craftsman prepares the cherry bark before applying this as a veneer to a range of objects.
sentences.cn: 在将这种工艺作为一系列物体的单板运用之前，角馆的工匠在自己的作坊准备樱花树皮。

sentences.en: Our dog, Rex, used to sit outside our front gate and bark.
sentences.cn: 我们的狗雷克斯过去常蹲在大门外吠叫.

sentences.en: Pitch bleeds freely from break in the bark.
sentences.cn: 树脂从树皮的裂口自然地流出来.

sentences.en: The bark of some trees can be used as medicine.
sentences.cn: 有些树皮可以作药材.

sentences.en: The Doberman let out a string of roaring barks.
sentences.cn: 那条杜宾犬发出一连串的吼叫声。

sentences.en: The dog suddenly started barking at us.
sentences.cn: 那条狗突然开始对我们汪汪叫。

sentences.en: The leaves, bark and sap are also common ingredients of local herbal remedies.
sentences.cn: 树叶、树皮和树汁也是当地草药的常用药材。

sentences.en: This tree is always recognizable by its extremely beautiful silvery bark.
sentences.cn: 这种树很容易辨认，因为它有着非常漂亮的银色树皮。

sentences.en: We found that birch bark could serve as paper.
sentences.cn: 我们发现桦树皮可以作纸用.

words.tran_cn: [植] 含有树皮的；似树皮的
[木] 剥皮机；剥树皮工；杂耍、戏院前叫喊招揽观众的人
吠声；任何似犬狐叫的声音

phrases.tran_cn: 狗朝着（对着）某人叫；对…狗吠
找错目标：精力或注意力集中在错误地方

phrases.phrase: be barking up the wrong tree
someone's bark is worse than their bite
phrases.tran_cn: 某人说话严厉，但并无恶意

trans.tran_cn: 吠声，树皮，短促响亮的人声，擦破的......皮
trans.tran_en: the sharp loud sound made by a dog
when a dog barks, it makes a short loud sound or series of sounds
when a dog barks, it makes a short loud sound or series of sounds
